item.description:
Are you a Reiki student, practitioner or master?


Come out tonight and feel the love! Rhys and I would love to show all my Reiki students (And any Reiki student) how much we think Reiki ROCKS by having a mini Reiki share and teaching you guys a new healing.  It's a Full Spectrum healing and since you have been studying Reiki, it will be a snap for you learn. This is an amazing opportunity for you to learn from Rhys Thomas, a true energy healing master. So if you have ever been curious about what we teach in the school, or what the difference is between Reiki and Full Spectrum Healing, here is your chance to try some.  You will give a healing and get a healing!    And hey, if you are aren't a Reiki person want to come and check it out, come on down! 

Register with Lisa if you are coming so we know how many snacks to get! 

solsticehealing@yahoo.com

508 473-0609

group.name: The Metrowest Reiki and Energy Healers Share

item.name: Reiki Appreciation Night
